show_name: Eiga Precure All Stars: Minna de Utau Kiseki no Mahō! (movie)
other_title: Eiga Precure All Stars Minna de Utau♪ Kiseki no Mahō! (Japanese)
Precure All Stars: Sing Together, Miracle Magic!
映画プリキュアオールスターズ みんなで歌う♪奇跡の魔法！ (Japanese)
plot: Mirai and Rico come to the human world to play, but are separated when the witch Sorciere and her servant Torauuma suddenly appear. Their aim is to acquire the tears of the 44 Precure girls, using them for her "Most Evil Magic." Only the friendship of all 44 Precure girls will allow them to protect the world.
ending_theme: "Because everyone is here☆Pretty Cure All Stars" by Rie Takahashi, Yui Horie, Yu Shimamura, Masumi Asano, Hibiku Yamamura, and Miyuki Sawashiro
insert_song: "Because you are here あなたがいるから, Anata ga Iru Kara)" by Rie Takahashi, Yui Horie, Yu Shimamura, Masumi Asano, Hibiku Yamamura, Miyuki Sawashiro, Nao Tōyama, and Shiho Kokido
"Let's Consider (考えてみて, Kangaete mite)" by Rie Takahashi, Yui Horie, and Seiko Niizuma
"Secret Medicine's Recipe (秘薬のレシピ, Hiyaku no Reshipi)" by Koji Yamamoto and Seiko Niizuma
"The Witch's Lullaby (Acapella ver.) (魔女の子守唄（アカペラ ver.）, Majo no Komoriuta (Akapera ver.)" by Seika Niizuma
"The Witch's Lullaby~The Song of Magic (魔女の子守唄～歌は魔法, Majo no Komoriuta~Uta wa Mahō)" by Seiko Niizuma and Pretty Cure All Stars
"We Finally Meet! (やっと会えたね！,Yatto Aeta ne!)" by Mayumi Gojo
